Title: addDays
Description: Adds a specified number of days to a date, a date with time or a string-encoded date / date with time.
date: Date / date with time to add specified number of days to. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64, String.num: Number of days to add. (U)Int*, Float*.
Returns date plus num days. Date/Date32/DateTime/DateTime64.
Examples: WITH    toDate('2024-01-01') AS date,    toDateTime('2024-01-01 00:00:00') AS date_time,    '2024-01-01 00:00:00' AS date_time_stringSELECT    addDays(date, 5) AS add_days_with_date,    addDays(date_time, 5) AS add_days_with_date_time,    addDays(date_time_string, 5) AS add_days_with_date_time_string
